context_of_use: This use case allows power users to execute bulk operations on large sets of data or records for efficiency.
stakeholders_and_interests: power user: improve efficiency in handling data
description: Allows power users to execute bulk operations on large sets of data or records for efficiency.
triggering_event: Power user initiates a bulk operation.
preconditions: Power user is authenticated and authorized to perform bulk operations.
postconditions: Bulk operations are successfully executed on the specified data sets.
assumptions: The system has the capability to handle bulk operations.
requirements_met: The system shall allow power users to handle bulk operations efficiently.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of bulk operations supported by the system.
main_flow: 1. Power user selects the data sets for bulk operations → System displays the selected data sets.
2. Power user specifies the operation to be performed → System prepares to execute the specified operation.
3. Power user confirms the execution of the bulk operation → System executes the bulk operation and provides feedback on the outcome.
